vlive.english: With each step they take, the sky darkens...

examples.korean: He quickened his pace to catch up with them. 발음듣기 그는 그들을 따라잡기 위해 걸음을 빨리 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He quickened his pace to catch up with them. 발음

examples.korean: He crossed the room in two strides. 발음듣기 그는 두 걸음 만에 방을 건너갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He crossed the room in two strides. 발음

examples.korean: Her wet shoes squelched at every step. 발음듣기 그녀의 젖은 신발은 걸음을 옮길 때마다 질벅거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her wet shoes squelched at every step. 발음

examples.korean: We followed the youngsters at a more sedate pace. 발음듣기 우리는 좀 더 차분한 걸음으로 그 청소년들을 뒤따랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We followed the youngsters at a more sedate pace. 발음

examples.korean: He stopped to receive hugs and kisses from the fans. 발음듣기 그는 걸음을 멈추고 팬들의 포옹과 키스를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He stopped to receive hugs and kisses from the fans. 발음
